turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about 2006 FIFA World Cup qualification (UEFA).
turn.1: When was the draw for the 2006 FIFA World Cup qualification?
turn.2: The draw was made on 5 December 2003 in Frankfurt, Germany.
turn.5: How were the teams seeded for the tournament?
turn.6: The other seedings were determined by points per game in the qualifiers for 2002 FIFA World Cup qualification and UEFA Euro 2004 qualifying.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: France qualified automatically for the 2002 FIFA World Cup as title holders, so only their record in UEFA Euro 2004 qualifying was used.
turn.9: Were any other teams treated in a similar way?
turn.10: Portugal qualified automatically for UEFA Euro 2004 as hosts, so only their record in World Cup 2002 was used.
turn.11: How were the teams that did not qualify seeded?
turn.12: Kazakhstan were not ranked by this system as they did not participate in either competition.
